name: Cannibal Girl Adventures
description:
this game was released in 2021 through our website ( https://cingolig.wixsite.com/cgadvssgames ) and it was our first game ever, made with RPG Maker VX ACE in the span of like 4/5 months. 

it was only avaibile with an italian version at the start, but due to demand by some of my Discord friends i've added an english version (i did it by myself, cuz Hide isnt very good in english ._. )

the link on the download button here on itch.io will download the english version, but if you are italian and you need the OG italian version, click here: https://mega.nz/file/MvoWhJAQ#FEs2A2yVun4QPnPC33pm8ghy9LWmjagjePU5hHX3OqE

requested RPG MAKER VX ACE RTP for running.
